Seems to be a duplicate of bug 29966...

hello, if this is a duplicate of 29966, is there a fix?  i don't see anything 
in 29966 that could help me...  (i'm using windows xp - not nt)
Sorry, can't do much of WSAD leaks.  Any ideas UI?

Not really.  Helen, would it be possible to narrow down where the problems 
might be.  If you have a repeatable test case perhaps you could try doing the 
test after closing one of the WSAD views, problem still occurs.. close the 
next view etc... same with Editors.. to see if we could identify the guilty 
party.  I am closing this bug.  Please reopen if you find that the leaking 
view/editor or other component is actually not part of WSAD but the Eclipse 
SDK.
